collection_holder_name: Arts Library, Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext.collection_title: Paul and Margaret Schneider Collection of Script Material for Television
pageContext.collection_description: Consists primarily of material written by Paul and/or Margaret Schneider for a variety of television productions, including The Eddie Cantor Comedy Theatre (television) but also some unspecified material dealing with radio. Unpublished finding aid.
